Title : Tin Purush
Artist: Ayub Bachchu
Album : Piano


[Verse]

[ch]Am[/ch]..................
Ek purushe gore dhon 

[ch]Am[/ch].............
Ek purushe khai

...[ch]C[/ch]...................
Ar ek purush eshe dekhe

..[ch]G[/ch]..............
Khaowar kichu nai

[ch]Am[/ch].............
Amar tin purush

[ch]C[/ch]..................[ch]Am[/ch].....
Tin purush amar tin purush......(2x)


[Bridge]

[ch]Am[/ch]................................
Dada-dadi,nana-nani ar to piche nai

[ch]Am[/ch]................................
Baba-ma er pore ami amar piche nai

[ch]C[/ch].......................[ch]G[/ch]...........
Duniate eshe dekhi dhonshompotti nai


[ch]Am[/ch].............
Amar tin purush

[ch]C[/ch]..................[ch]Am[/ch].....
Tin purush amar tin purush


[Bridge]

Ai duniar kono kichui shonge jabe na
 
Tin purusher ek purusher kotha vule na

Shesh purusher bhagye tobu vitamati nai

Amar tin purush

Tin purush amar tin purush


[Repeat Verse] 


Chords by

Apon

INTRO: [ch]E[/ch]-[ch]A[/ch]-[ch]E[/ch]-[ch]A[/ch]


[ch]E[/ch]
Hun sitter foran meg på første rad,hun har
[ch]A[/ch]
blå øyne og er bestandig glad
[ch]H[/ch]                          [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]E[/ch]
jeg er forelska men jeg får det ikke frem
[ch]E[/ch]
Jeg sender lapper men jeg fåkke no svar
[ch]A[/ch]
hun syns at jeg ikke er no til kar
[ch]H[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]E[/ch]     
hun er forelska men det er ikke i meg

CHORUS:
[ch]C#M[/ch]                         [ch]HM[/ch]-[ch]A[/ch]
Hun er forelska i lærer`n, å-å-å
[ch]A[/ch]                    [ch]G#[/ch]-[ch]F#[/ch] 
Forelska i lærer`n, å-å-å
[ch]F#[/ch]                                  [ch]E[/ch]
Hun er forelska i lærer`n og ikke i meg

2-VERS:
(The same as over)

Lærer`n vår er 20-år,han har kraftig kropp

og halv lang hår,han er hele skolens don juan

og jeg er bare 15-år,hun sier: kom tilbake om fire år

hun er forelska men det er ikke i meg

Hun er forelska i lærer`n, å-å-å
                    [ch]Em[/ch]
Forelska i lærer`n, å-å-å
                                  [ch]G[/ch]
Hun er forelska i lærer`n og ikke i meg

2-VERS:
(The same as over)

Lærer`n vår er 20-år,han har kraftig kropp

og halv lang hår,han er hele skolens don juan

og jeg er bare 15-år,hun sier: kom tilbake om fire år

hun er forelska men det er ikke i meg

CHORUS:

GUITAR SOLO:

CHORUS:

name: Ode To Lrc
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             Ode to LRC - Band of Horses
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tabbed by: Scibrandio
Email: Scibrandio@gmail.com

Tuning: EADGBE

For this song I play the F/Bb as barre chords, along with the C chord during 'the world 
such a wonderful...' sectionm.

Power chords would work also, but when they played it live it was with barre chords.

Intro (listen to track for strumming)

Dm->C->Bb->F->Bb->F

Verse:

[ch]Dm[/ch]                                          [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]Dm[/ch]      

In the lobby of the LRC well I knew I'd find something

                                                                [ch]C[/ch]

A hundred stroies sittin there to read I got my focals out I put 'em on

[ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]

And all is calm, all is calm


[ch]Dm[/ch]                                                           [ch]C[/ch]

Theres a doggie coming here to eat now which dated back to 1993

[ch]Dm[/ch]                                                                            [ch]C[/ch]

I don't care what the people say 'cause that dog he don't come around here anymore

[ch]Bb[/ch]                                   [ch]F[/ch]

No, no the dog is gone, the dog is gone

[ch]Bb[/ch]                                   [ch]F[/ch]

No, no the dog is gone, the dog is gone

F->Bb

[ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]Bb[/ch]

The town's so small how could anybody not

[ch]F[/ch]                       [ch]Bb[/ch]
Look you in the eye or wave as you drive by

[ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]Bb[/ch]

The world is such a wonderful place

[ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]Dm[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]Bb[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]Bb[/ch] [ch]F[/ch] 

The world is such a wonderful...


[ch]Dm[/ch]                                                                          [ch]C[/ch]
I see everyone before me, there was birthday sex and sleep some weren't getting along

[ch]Dm[/ch]                                                                          [ch]C[/ch]

Nobody's outside trying to murder nobody's outside, there's no one really at all

[ch]Bb[/ch]                                [ch]F[/ch]

What the hell i saw, the hell i saw

[ch]Bb[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]

The hell i saw, the hell i saw

F->Bb


[ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]Bb[/ch]

The town is so small how could anybody not

[ch]F[/ch]                     [ch]Bb[/ch]
Look me in the eye or wave as i drive by

[ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]Bb[/ch]

The world is such a wonderful place

[ch]C[/ch]                          [ch]Bb[/ch]

The world is such a wonderful place

[ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]Bb[/ch]

The world is such a wonderful place

[ch]C[/ch]                          [ch]Bb[/ch]

The world is such a wonderful place

        [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]           f            [ch]Bb[/ch]     [ch]F[/ch]

La di da, La da di da da, La di da, La da di da da

The other version by Scibrandio (uploaded by member Lanath) is 100% percent 
correct, the only difference here is that this is with CAPO ON THE FIRST FRET, 
which may make things easier for rookies as it allows more basic chords (except 
maybe for the C#m). So thank you, Scibrandio/Lanath.
Here goes:

Intro
[ch]C#m[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]A[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]
